resources.string: About Developer - Kn Video Studio LLC

The mobile app was developed by Kn Video Studio LLC.
 App was published online on Nov 12, 2012.
 Latest Upgrade January 06, 2016 
 Phone: 404-909-9557
 Email: mobileapp@knvideostudio.com
 Web Site: http://www.knvideostudio.com
Vasko is capturing the most remarkable images, the incredible journey through his photographic work was recognized in different countries.\n\n He is working in these areas:

• Capture Memorable Portraits 
 • Education Awards Ceremony
 • Fine Art Photography
 • Shooting Sports Events
 • Weddings

Vasko is coming from the most beautiful country in the world, Bulgaria which is located between Macedonia, Greece, Romania, and Black sea. His home town is Vidin, archaically spelled as Widdin in English. The town is a port town on the southern bank of the river Danube in northwestern Bulgaria. It is close to the borders with Serbia and Romania.\n\n

Vasko has been photographing different events for most of his life. He is completely self-taught. His deep and emotional connection with the nature helps him creating perfect images. Have a look few of his images below: \n\n
